title: Viral fears: Era of COVID dubbed: ‘The Great Hysteria’ – Fear/Lockdown/Mask Mandates compared to Salem witch trial madness

opengraph.title: Viral fears: Era of COVID dubbed: ‘The Great Hysteria’ – Fear/Lockdown/Mask Mandates compared to Salem witch trial madness

tweets:
Great Hysteria. That's it. https://t.co/Hg3ZwRG6aM

— Sanjeev Sabhlok, Pope @Church of Reason & Liberty (@sabhlok) September 6, 2020

We are living in what will come to be known in history as the Great Hysteria.

Enjoy the ride!

— Sanjeev Sabhlok, Pope @Church of Reason & Liberty (@sabhlok) September 7, 2020

The coronavirus "pandemic" has exposed the underbelly of Western civilisation.

Inside is the same core of totalitarianism that we get in Third World nations.

I thought man was free in the West. He's even more in chains.

— Sanjeev Sabhlok, Pope @Church of Reason & Liberty (@sabhlok) September 8, 2020

Australia is now like N.Korea – it doesn't allow its own citizens to leave the country.

Prof James Allen is right. Australia could do with a No Lockdown party. I've called for a constitutional amendment that would prohibit such extreme restrictions.https://t.co/IIHKjgIoC8

— Sanjeev Sabhlok, Pope @Church of Reason & Liberty (@sabhlok) September 8, 2020

They apparently care for my health.

But stopped me:
– from playing tennis
– from taking a vacation by blocking the state border
– from going even to see the nearby reservoir
– from breathing while walking uphill

And no reasoning why.

Thanks for your care, @VictorianCHO.

— Sanjeev Sabhlok, Pope @Church of Reason & Liberty (@sabhlok) September 8, 2020

Trying to kill a virus with a lockdown is like trying to kill a massive swarm of mosquitoes with a sledgehammer.

It can never work.

How did a swarm of idiots who can't figure this out, manage to descend upon us at the highest level of government – across the entire world?

— Sanjeev Sabhlok, Pope @Church of Reason & Liberty (@sabhlok) September 7, 2020

Our servants are behaving like our masters. And those whom we pay to ask questions have gone silent.

Something has gone deeply wrong.

— Sanjeev Sabhlok, Pope @Church of Reason & Liberty (@sabhlok) September 8, 2020

Correct. Why would anyone trust a rushed vaccine for a virus that is seriously dangerous to very few people – especially after we have seen public health authorities pretend masks work against nearly all the available evidence? https://t.co/Wgq1KYjlVk

— Alex Berenson (@AlexBerenson) September 6, 2020

Child abuse. https://t.co/dBw4wTZrv4

I remain sane because there are still people like Alan Jones left in Australia.

Says a salaried MP who's never run a business. 'Zero covid.' What utter nonsense. What next? We all lock ourselves up until there is zero TB? Zero HIV? Zero flu? Zero anything infectious? As for his claim trying to get back to normal will harm the economy, give me strength… https://t.co/ozpmIf2EYK

I'm afraid these communist politicians and government "scientists" lead me no choice but to teach my children to disrespect and even at times disobey the government.

Governments have behaved so badly this time it will take many generations for them to regain any respect.

These bastards are trying to control of our breathing itself! In the open air!!

Such deep hatred for other humans I have never felt before.

Irrationality and totalitarianism do have consequences.

Says a salaried MP who's never run a business. 'Zero covid.' What utter nonsense. What next? We all lock ourselves up until there is zero TB? Zero HIV? Zero flu? Zero anything infectious? As for his claim trying to get back to normal will harm the economy, give me strength… https://t.co/ozpmIf2EYK
